name: synth-mcp
long_description: SN50 | Synth API: The Synth API provides the latest & historical prediction rates as well as the current leaderboard.

server_url.title: Server URL
server_url.description: The URL of the server to connect to

tools.name: get-insights-liquidation
tools.description:
Insight - Liquidation probability

It selects the top 'limit' miners from the the meta-leaderboard to calculate the probability of liquidation in 6, 12, 18 and 24 hours for different price levels.

tools.name: get-insights-lp-bounds
tools.description:
Insight - Liquidity provider bounds

It selects the top 'limit' miners from the the meta-leaderboard to calculate price intervals and probability to stay in each interval for the next 24 hours, expected time to stay in each interval and impermanent loss.

tools.name: get-insights-lp-probabilities
tools.description:
Insight - Liquidity provider probabilities

Calculate the probability of asset price to be above 11 prices and bellow 11 prices.

tools.name: get-insights-option-pricing
tools.description:
Insight - Option pricing

It selects the top 'limit' miners from the the meta-leaderboard to calculate the call and put prices for different strike prices.

tools.name: get-insights-polymarket-range
tools.description:
Insight - Polymarket price range

It selects the top 'limit' miners from the the meta-leaderboard to compare polymarket and synth probability and outcome for each range.

tools.name: get-insights-polymarket-up-down-daily
tools.description:
Insight - Polymarket up/down daily

It selects the top 'limit' miners from the the meta-leaderboard to compare polymarket and synth probability and outcome.

tools.name: get-insights-polymarket-up-down-hourly
tools.description:
Insight - Polymarket up/down hourly

It selects the top 'limit' miners from the the meta-leaderboard to compare polymarket and synth probability and outcome.

tools.name: get-insights-volatility
tools.description:
Insight - Volatility

It selects the top 'limit' miners from the the meta-leaderboard to calculate the volatility.

tools.name: get-prediction-percentiles
tools.description:
Prediction Percentiles - meta model from top 10 miners

Get price distribution percentiles over the forecast horizon.

tools.name: get-v2-leaderboard-historical
tools.description:
Leaderboard -  Leaderboard History V2

Gets the leaderboard history.

tools.name: get-v2-leaderboard-latest
tools.description:
Leaderboard - Latest Leaderboard V2

Gets the current leaderboard.

tools.name: get-v2-meta-leaderboard-historical
tools.description:
Leaderboard - Meta-Leaderboard History V2

Gets the meta-leaderboard history, which aggregates miners' incentives over a period of days in the past.

tools.name: get-v2-meta-leaderboard-latest
tools.description:
Leaderboard - Latest Meta-Leaderboard V2

Get the current meta-leaderboard, which aggregates miners' incentives over a period of days. This provides another way to rank prediction accuracy, thereby increasing stability.

tools.name: get-v2-prediction-best
tools.description:
Predictions - Best Prediction Rates

Gets the latest prediction rates of the current best miner.

tools.name: get-v2-prediction-historical
tools.description:
Predictions - Historical Prediction Rates

Gets the historical prediction rates.

tools.name: get-v2-prediction-latest
tools.description:
Predictions - Latest Prediction Rates

Gets the latest valid prediction rates.

tools.name: get-validation-miner
tools.description:
Validations - Miner Validation

Gets the validation status for a specific miner

tools.name: get-validation-scores-historical
tools.description:
Validations - Historical Scores

Gets the validation scores for all miners between two dates

tools.name: get-validation-scores-latest
tools.description:
Validations - Latest Scores

Gets the most recent validation scores for all miners
